products.title: Dress
products.description: Max out your looks this season with this statement maxi dress. With a flattering longline silhouette that skims your body and accentuates your curves, a floor length dress is comfortable, versatile, and a go-to choice for the summer. Opt for a long sleeve maxi dress for formal occasions, whilst a strapless maxi is perfect for casual days. Available in a range of prints, pastels and shapes, this long dress is a key piece in your wardrobe for seasonal dressing.  95% Polyester 5% Elastane. Model wears UK size 10.

products.title: Hoodie
products.description: Wanna keep things comfy? Jump on the oversized trend with this men's oversized hoodie from our latest collection. With a relaxed fit and a hood attached to the neckline, we're talking all over comfort all. season. long. Wear with joggers and slides for off-duty days or team with paint splatter jeans and a shacket for a look we love.  70% Cotton And 30% Polyester, Model Is 6'1" And Wears Size M

products.title: Hoodie
products.model: MAN OFFICIAL JERSEY HOODIE WITH SNOOD
products.description: Get ready for cosy season in this piece from our men's snood hoodies collection. Good for cold weather and designed to keep your neck warm, it’s an essential item to add to your wardrobe. Match this hoodie with your favourite pair of jeans and tee for a casual look. Or bring this hoodie along to any occasion, for the cooler weather. This hoodie can be raised high enough to cover the nose and mouth, adding even more warmth. A winner's piece of clothing for the season.  Style: Plain Hoodie Design: Embroidered Fabric: Jersey Neckline: Snood Sleeve Length: Long Sleeve 100% Cotton. Model is 6'1' And Wears Size M.

products.title: Jeans
products.description: Every guy needs a really great pair of men’s regular fit jeans. This classic fit is a wardrobe staple, and goes with anything. Dress it up with a grandad shirt and desert boots, or throw on a trucker jacket and chunky trainers to add edge to your casual look. Non-restrictive and comfortable, you’ll wear these all day and all night long. Whether you go for a classic blue denim or the more versatile black men’s regular jeans, we've got you.

products.title: T-shirt
products.description: Stock up on new-season staples with this men's oversized tshirt from our latest collection. An oversized style with a relaxed fit, this tee has off-duty written all over it. Cut with extra room for maximum comfort, pair with anything from paint splatter jeans to straight leg cargos. Wear under an open shirt for a look we love or style tucked in with chinos and brogues for a preppy vibe.  100% Cotton, Model Is 6'1 And Wears Size M

products.title: Suit
products.description: Elevate your street style with this men's sweater tracksuit from our latest collection. Designed in a soft and cosy fabric that looks just as good as it feels, this set promises to keep you warm and comfortable when the weather app's looking questionable. Whether you've got plans that require little-to-no effort or a hot date with your sofa, this set is a new-season must have.  50% Cotton And 50% Polyester, Model Is 6'1' And Wears Size M

products.title: Dress
products.model: PLUS STRIPE ROLL NECK MIDAXI KNITTED DRESS
products.description: Bring a new kinda attitude in this latest piece from our collection of plus size dresses. Available in UK sizes 16-24, our range of curve dresses carries all the on-trend pieces you need to feel confident. Whether it's a plus size black dress or skater style you're adding to your basket, we promise no more awkward fits, just dresses you can depend on. Work a flattering plus size shirt dress or smock shapes during the day, then take on the night in sexy styles, maxi lengths and Bardot necklines.  This garment is READY FOR THE FUTURE.  It is made with recycled acrylic. Find out more about our material goals.  READY FOR THE FUTURE GUIDELINES.  100% Recycled Acrylic. Machine Wash. Model wears a UK size 16.
